pages.title: Are your perspectives or experiences missing from the conversation? If so, add them in the box below.

elements.html:
What makes a good statement?

\
    \
  • Stand alone idea
    • \
  • Raise new perspectives, experiences, or issues
    • \
  • Clear & concise (limited to 280 characters each)
    • \
\

A few examples:

\
    \
  • Any adult should be able to buy an assault weapon
    • \
  • Restrictions on assault weapon ownership will harm the gun industry and lead to job losses
    • \
  • Every person owning or using an assault weapon should carry a license or a permit
    • \

elements.name: statements
elements.title: Please remember, statements are displayed randomly, and you are not replying directly to other participants' statements. Please separate multiple statements with a period ('.')
